name: Ad Blocker
text:
An Ad Blocker is a content filtering browser extension designed to filter out advertisements from rendering within your browser. Whilst useful, Ad Blockers can some times interfere with a websites performance.

Installing an Ad Blocker

Chrome

  • Visit the Chrome Web Store
  • Search for Ad Blocker
  • Be sure to check the extensions rating and reviews before installing

Disabling an Ad Blocker

Chrome

  • Locate your Ad Blockers Icon, on the right next to the Address Bar
  • Click the Icon
  • Click the disable button or tag, depending on your extension (often in the form of a power icon)
  • Refresh your page to disable the Ad Blocker

Note: Ad Blocker will remain disabled on a per site basis in most cases
